About Page

Short Bio

My name is Vlad (but you can call me Red) and I am a product designer, Lego builder and a lot other things I want to become but can't call myself that yet. I'm also a human!
I usually post my creations on social media but none of the big sites gives me all the features I need. That's why this site exists! I've created it so I can share my stuff with you in a way I'd prefer.
